snippet: Though there are still no large trials to prove or disprove the full worth of vitamin D, studies have linked low levels of it to risks of heart disease, high blood pressure and other diseases.
abstract: Though there are still no large trials to prove or disprove the full worth of vitamin D, studies have linked low levels of it to risks of heart disease, high blood pressure and other diseases.

headline.main: Reasons That Vitamin D May Matter
headline.print_headline: Personal Health: Reasons That Vitamin D May Matter
